title: FPV War Kamikaze Drone
description: FPV War: Kamikaze Drone is a high-tech combat simulator that puts you in control of modern FPV drones across intense tactical missions. Experience the action through a realistic first-person view, enhanced by explosive visuals and immersive ragdoll physics, placing you right at the heart of the battlefield. Control combat FPV drones to destroy enemy vehicles and infantry using a mix of strategic planning, precision piloting, and a variety of powerful weapons. Every map challenges you to maximize your efficiency and secure victory.
